description.value: As a standard action, a kitsune can assume the appearance of a specific single Medium humanoid. The kitsune always takes this specific form when using this ability. The kitsune gains a +10 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.aayAhTaRzitONs5U]{Disguise} checks to appear as that type of humanoid. This ability otherwise functions as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.HGg3fIQGDzUwueVa]{Disguise Self}, except that the kitsune can remain in this form indefinitely.

modifiers.name: Change Shape
